alert.note: Alert for Morris; Sussex (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 28 at 11:57AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT NORTHEASTERN MORRIS AND SUSSEX COUNTIES... At 1156 AM EST, a cluster of snow showers were located across portions of Sussex and Morris Counties. Movement was east at 20 mph. Light snow may accumulate on bridges and overpasses and other elevated surfaces, creating slippery conditions. Locations impacted include... Newton, Montague, Dover, Hopatcong, Lincoln Park, Kinnelon, Boonton, Butler, Wharton, Rockaway, Mount Arlington, Franklin, Mountain Lakes, Riverdale, Hamburg, Ogdensburg, Sussex, Victory Gardens, Branchville, and Andover. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in New Jersey between mile markers 32 and 48. Interstate 287 in New Jersey between mile markers 42 and 54. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
